name: Masumi Payments
description: Zero-config blockchain payments and agent registry for OpenClaw agents. Enable with one command: masumi_enable()
author: Masumi Network

paymentServiceUrl.description: YOUR self-hosted Masumi Payment Service URL. You run this yourself - there is NO centralized service. Examples: http://localhost:3000/api/v1 (local) or https://your-service.railway.app/api/v1 (Railway)

registryServiceUrl.description: Masumi Registry Service URL (optional, defaults to paymentServiceUrl)

paymentApiKey.description: Payment API key with ReadAndPay permission (optional if auto-provisioning)

registryApiKey.description: Registry API key (optional, defaults to paymentApiKey)

sellerVkey.description: Seller wallet verification key (optional if auto-provisioning)

agentIdentifier.description: Agent ID from Masumi registration (auto-generated if not provided)

autoProvision.description: Automatically provision wallet and register agent on first use

agentName.description: Agent display name (optional, auto-generated from OpenClaw context)

pricingTier.description: Default pricing tier for auto-provisioned agents

appApiKey.description: MoltBook app API key for verification

autoAcceptPayments.description: Automatically accept and process payments (use with caution)
